name: Solana & College.xyz x Blockchain Chicago
description:
Blockchain Chicago is proud to present Solana Across Campuses at UChicago, a nationwide meetup powered by College.xyz bringing builders, creators, and curious minds together to explore the Solana ecosystem.

Come hang out, learn how to set up your first wallet, earn $500 worth of SOL, and see what students across the country are building on Solana.

timeFormatted: Dec 5, 10:00 AM â€“ Dec 6, 8:00 PM EST
name: Midwest Blockchain Conference
description:
Where Talent Meets Opportunity

The Midwest Blockchain Conference (MBC) is the leading access point connecting top university talent with the blockchain industry across the U.S. and beyond. What started in the heartland of Ann Arbor has grown into a national movement and global network, now spanning 70+ universities including schools in South America and Europe.

Built by students for students, MBC brings together university clubs, high schools, alumni, and industry leaders, all focused on pushing crypto forward through student leadership.
location: Ross School of Business, Ann Arbor, Michigan
